## Simple Heads&Tails gambling service
### Notes:
* Time spent: about 5.5 hours
* Project has no DB support, but there are Repo interfaces, that can be used to easily add it
* The reason why there is RandomBooleanProvider is that pseudo-random generators can cause
vulnerabilities, so the implementation can be easily changes if needed
* In order to see the report load ```src/test/resources/jmeter/result.jtl``` to [this page](https://csvfiddle.io/#)
and run ```Result``` query
* The test plan is in ```src/test/resources/jmeter/TestPlan.jmx```
